show.title: Leid Stories

header.title: Decompress From the Week’s Woes, It’s “Free Your Mind Friday!”

title: Decompress From the Week’s Woes, It’s “Free Your Mind Friday!”
content:
Are you sullen and on edge because your brilliant analysis of current events or masterful deconstruction of a complex... <!--more--> issue hasn’t been heard, let alone appreciated?
Is that what’s bothering you, friend?
Well, suffer in silence no more!
It’s Free Your Mind Friday on Leid Stories, and we’re all here, waiting for you!
We’re a fine bunch—big-hearted, even tempered, well mannered, and connoisseurs of good ideas.
You’ll be in great company.
Call in and express yourself.
Your mind will thank you for unburdening, and will reward you with a wonderful weekend.
